``` python
import logging
from rich.logging import RichHandler

FORMAT = "%(message)s"
logging.basicConfig(
    level="NOTSET",
    format=FORMAT,
    datefmt="[%X]",
    handlers=[RichHandler(show_level=False)]
)

log = logging.getLogger("rich")
log.info("test")
```
